SELECT ob.id,ob.name,
ob.future_goal goal,ob.future_key_status key_status
ob.goal,ob.key_status
FROM oldman_base ob,organ org,auto_value x WHERE x.id=ob.xq_id AND org.id=x.parent_index
and (ob.future_key_status =2 or ob.future_key_status =3 or ob.future_key_status =4)
and (ob.key_status =2 or ob.key_status =3 or ob.key_status =4)
and ob.id=#{entity.id}
and org.id in ( SELECT case o.parent when 0 then child.id else o.id end id from organ o left join organ child on child.parent=o.id WHERE o.id=#{entity.organId} )
ORDER BY future_key_status
ORDER BY key_status
desc
limit #{start},#{length}

SELECT count(1) FROM oldman_base ob,organ org,auto_value x WHERE x.id=ob.xq_id AND org.id=x.parent_index
and (ob.future_key_status =2 or ob.future_key_status =3 or ob.future_key_status =4)
and (ob.key_status =2 or ob.key_status =3 or ob.key_status =4)
and org.id in ( SELECT case o.parent when 0 then child.id else o.id end id from organ o left join organ child on child.parent=o.id WHERE o.id=#{entity.organId} )

SELECT ob.id,ob.key_status,ob.birthday,ob.floor,oe.economic_index,oldf.family_index,ohb.intelligence,ohb.eyesight,ho.home_id,hs.id hsid,hs.fir_type, case oo.num when 0 then 57 else 58 end isActivityOrgan FROM oldman_base ob left join home_oldman ho on ob.id=ho.oldman_id left join home h on ho.home_id=h.id and h.fir_type=2 left join health_select_oldman hso on hso.oldman_id=ob.id left join health_select hs on hs.id=hso.health_select_id and hs.fir_type in (1,2) left join organ_oldman oo on oo.oldman_id=ob.id left join organ org on org.id=oo.organ_id left join organ_type ot on ot.id=org.organ_type_id and ot.fir_type=21, oldman_economic oe,oldman_family oldf,oldman_health_base ohb where ob.id=oe.oldman_id and ob.id=oldf.oldman_id and ob.id=ohb.oldman_id

SELECT ob.id,ob.key_status,ob.future_key_status,ob.birthday,ob.floor,oe.economic_index,oldf.family_index,ohb.intelligence,ohb.eyesight,ho.home_id,hs.id hsid,hs.fir_type, case oo.num when 0 then 57 else 58 end isActivityOrgan FROM oldman_base ob left join home_oldman ho on ob.id=ho.oldman_id left join home h on ho.home_id=h.id and h.fir_type=2 left join health_select_oldman hso on hso.oldman_id=ob.id left join health_select hs on hs.id=hso.health_select_id and hs.fir_type in (1,2) left join organ_oldman oo on oo.oldman_id=ob.id left join organ org on org.id=oo.organ_id left join organ_type ot on ot.id=org.organ_type_id and ot.fir_type=21, oldman_economic oe,oldman_family oldf,oldman_health_base ohb where ob.id=oe.oldman_id and ob.id=oldf.oldman_id and ob.id=ohb.oldman_id and ob.id in( select a.id from (select oo.id from oldman_base oo where oo.id>${current} limit 0,#{round} ) as a )
